posts.description:
-
-
‚ò∫ Another shot from the @london4all shoot at @stpauldcathedrallondon...such a great evening! Thanks again to both for organising! Hope everyone is having a good week ‚ò∫
-
-

Hi All, hope you are well. London at blue hour...I miss shooting these scenes...this is one from the archives taken from the Waterloo Bridge last year that I hadn't edited till now...with new buildings being added to London's skyline pretty regularly even this view has changed a little with No 1 Blackfriars now considerably higher...looking forward to shooting this again soon!

It's been two and a half months since I last picked up my camera and what a great place to start at St Paul's Cathedral! A huge thank you to the @london4all team for organising this for #WWIM15 and to @stpaulscathedrallondon for hosting us.
 It was so lovely to catch up with everyone again after such a difficult couple of months. There is so much love in the London Instagram Community, thank you all for being so kind to me. So having not taken a picture for so long I made a few errors as I'm pretty rusty...1) I didn't pack my wide angle lens...epic mistake for such an epic venue üò¢ 2) I didn't check my kit before I went...so I had a wobbly tripod..the one person I thought might save the day for me did...cheers @levanterman for lending me your Allen key...so my tip is always be prepared unlike me! Anyway as I couldn't shoot wide I got a bit of detail as in this shot...hope you like it üòçüòÄ
Tags for the event were: #london4all #ldn4all_wwim15 #ldn4all_stpauls and #justwater17...go check out the other pics from the evening.

‚ù§‚ù§ This is a tribute to my beautiful Mother who sadly passed away on January 31st. It's pretty hard facing my first Mothers Day without her. Some of you will know that in May last year my Mum became ill, we hoped for the best but unfortunately got the worst possible news...she had Cancer and it was terminal. Mum started on a course of Chemotherapy which did without a doubt improve things for a while. As a result I was able to enjoy more treasured time with her, and thankfully I used that short time wisely. My Mum was a person with a heart full of love, even in her lowest moments when she was ill her concern was for those around her and how they may be affected. My mother showed great courage dignity and faith, I hope and pray that I can become half the woman she was. Above all there was so much love during those months within my family...not everyone gets the time that we did to make sure nothing was left unsaid and for that I am grateful. The best way I can honour my Mum is to be a loving, caring person and try to be more like her. X ‚ù§‚ù§

-
-
‚ù§ "To walk alone in London is the greatest rest" ~ Virginia Woolf ‚ù§
-
-

‚ù§‚ò∫‚ò∫ I had a great afternoon yesterday renewing my annual pass for @shardview @theshardlondon. As luck would have it the sun came out just in time for sunset! I met up with the lovely @traceyburfield and @alisinworldland (it had been way too long) and we had a blast! Do check out their pics from the afternoon and you can see more on all of our Instastories. I feel very fortunate to have made some good friendships through Instagram, people I can be creative with and who I can laugh with...thank you üòô‚ò∫‚ò∫‚ù§

How do you wear and combine your Daniel Wellington? Get your own favourite DW at www.danielwellington.com. Use code GEMINTRIX15 and get 15% off all products. For more styles, follow @danielwellington
-
-
Thanks to my daughter @izzy_cohen1 for modelling for me xxx
-
-

Somehow I think London suits being photographed in the Winter even more than in other seasons...what do you think? I just like the mood cold winter nights lend to the landscape of the city.  On another note...back to work for me tomorrow, back to the daily grind but hoping for a busy first quarter as could do with making some good money for sure!
Ok best i do it too...here are my #bestnine2016...pretty much as I would expect with London landmarks topping the favourites...appreciate all your support thank you xxx

-
-
HAPPY NEW YEAR EVERYONE!!
-
-
This is the place to be in London tonight if your going to watch the fireworks. Unfortunately I can't be there myself tonight but I would suggest you check out the @london Instastory as they are planning to run a live feed tonight with several photographers and videographers contributing from different vantage points so should be good. I took this last night and it was pretty foggy but I think it will be clearer for the fireworks tonight fingers crossed! -
-
I wish all of you the very best for the New year and really appreciate all of the support and comments you give me...sending love and good wishes to everyone...PEACE xxx
-
